title: Spanx, Never Seen, Junior Poetry, Why We Cuss and more.
itunes:title: Spanx, Never Seen, Junior Poetry, Why We Cuss and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This show is live in living color for people of all colors. Big Dog has some friendly suggestions just for the ladies. We get another JRAP from your favorite play cousin. Fool #2 murders another one just for the cussers out there. Junior talks about things that he has never seen. Carla has a question for women only and it has something to do with under there. Here are examples of people in jobs that overdo it. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve says something simple, "If you want people to value you, you must first value yourself." Have a great weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
